newsitem.title: USA: Select Software sees Q4 charge of $2 mln.
newsitem.headline: Select Software sees Q4 charge of $2 mln.

text.p: SELECT Software Tools Inc on Thursday said it has purchased the Systems Engineer product line from Learmonth & Burchett Management System Inc for $2.0 million in cash, which it will write off as a charge against fourth quarter earnings.
Available immediately, Systems Engineer has been renamed SELECT SE and can be purchased for for $5,000 per client seat.

In a statement, Select said customers of its object- oriented modeling toolset, Select Enterprise, will now have access to a tightly integrated, enterprise-strength data modeling toolset to complete their modeling lifecycle.
